shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the remote audio state changes.

p.codeblock: public void onRemoteAudioStateChanged( int uid, REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE state, REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON reason, int elapsed) {}
public virtual void OnRemoteAudioStateChanged(uint uid, REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE state, REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON reason, int elapsed)

section.p: When the audio state of a remote user (in the voice/video call channel) or host (in the live streaming channel) changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the current state of the remote audio stream.
section.note: This callback does not work properly when the number of users (in the voice/video call channel) or hosts (in the live streaming channel) in the channel exceeds 17.

plentry.pd: The ID of the remote user whose audio state changes.
The state of the remote audio, see .
The reason of the remote audio state change, see .
Time elapsed (ms) from the local user calling the method until the SDK triggers this callback.
